displayName.Description: The display name of the watchlist

updated.Description: The last time the watchlist was updated

createdBy.Description: Describes a user that created the watchlist

updatedBy.Description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist

description.Description: A description of the watchlist

isDeleted.Description: A flag that indicates if the watchlist is deleted or not

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this watchlist

defaultDuration.Description: The default duration of a watchlist (in ISO 8601 duration format)

tenantId.Description: The tenantId where the watchlist belongs to

numberOfLinesToSkip.Description: The number of lines in a csv/tsv content to skip before the header

rawContent.Description: The raw content that represents to watchlist items to create. In case of csv/tsv content type, it's the content of the file that will parsed by the endpoint

itemsSearchKey.Description: The search key is used to optimize query performance when using watchlists for joins with other data. For example, enable a column with IP addresses to be the designated SearchKey field, then use this field as the key field when joining to other event data by IP address.

contentType.Description: The content type of the raw content. Example : text/csv or text/tsv

uploadStatus.Description: The status of the Watchlist upload : New, InProgress or Complete. Pls note : When a Watchlist upload status is equal to InProgress, the Watchlist cannot be deleted

watchlistItemsCount.Description: The number of Watchlist Items in the Watchlist

objectId.Description: The object id of the user.

suppressionDuration.Description: The suppression (in ISO 8601 duration format) to wait since last time this alert rule been triggered.

suppressionEnabled.Description: Determines whether the suppression for this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

tactics.Description: The tactics of the alert rule

incidentConfiguration.Description: The settings of the incidents that created from alerts triggered by this analytics rule

query.Description: The query that creates alerts for this rule.

customDetails.Description: Dictionary of string key-value pairs of columns to be attached to the alert

createIncident.Description: Create incidents from alerts triggered by this analytics rule

groupingConfiguration.Description: Set how the alerts that are triggered by this analytics rule, are grouped into incidents

lookbackDuration.Description: Limit the group to alerts created within the lookback duration (in ISO 8601 duration format)

matchingMethod.Description: Grouping matching method. When method is Selected at least one of groupByEntities, groupByAlertDetails, groupByCustomDetails must be provided and not empty.

groupByEntities.Description: A list of entity types to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected). Only entities defined in the current alert rule may be used.

groupByAlertDetails.Description: A list of alert details to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected)

groupByCustomDetails.Description: A list of custom details keys to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected). Only keys defined in the current alert rule may be used.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

contentId.Description: Static ID for the content.  Used to identify dependencies and content from solutions or community.  Hard-coded/static for out of the box content and solutions. Dynamic for user-created.  This is the resource name

parentId.Description: Full parent resource ID of the content item the metadata is for.  This is the full resource ID including the scope (subscription and resource group)

version.Description: Version of the content.  Default and recommended format is numeric (e.g. 1, 1.0, 1.0.0, 1.0.0.0), following ARM template best practices.  Can also be any string, but then we cannot guarantee any version checks

kind.Description: The kind of content the metadata is for.

source.Description: Source of the content.  This is where/how it was created.

author.Description: The creator of the content item.

support.Description: Support information for the metadata - type, name, contact information

dependencies.Description: Dependencies for the content item, what other content items it requires to work.  Can describe more complex dependencies using a recursive/nested structure. For a single dependency an id/kind/version can be supplied or operator/criteria for complex formats.

categories.Description: Categories for the solution content item

providers.Description: Providers for the solution content item

firstPublishDate.Description: first publish date solution content item

lastPublishDate.Description: last publish date for the solution content item

name.Description: Name of the content source.  The repo name, solution name, LA workspace name etc.

sourceId.Description: ID of the content source.  The solution ID, workspace ID, etc

name.Description: Name of the author. Company or person.

tier.Description: Type of support for content item

name.Description: Name of the support contact. Company or person.

link.Description: Link for support help, like to support page to open a ticket etc.

contentId.Description: Id of the content item we depend on

kind.Description: Type of the content item we depend on

version.Description: Version of the the content item we depend on.  Can be blank, * or missing to indicate any version fulfills the dependency.  If version does not match our defined numeric format then an exact match is required.

operator.Description: Operator used for list of dependencies in criteria array.

criteria.Description: This is the list of dependencies we must fulfill, according to the AND/OR operator

domains.Description: domain for the solution content item

verticals.Description: Industry verticals for the solution content item

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

alertDisplayName.Description: The display name of the alert.

alertType.Description: The type name of the alert.

compromisedEntity.Description: Display name of the main entity being reported on.

confidenceLevel.Description: The confidence level of this alert.

confidenceScore.Description: The confidence score of the alert.

confidenceScoreStatus.Description: The confidence score calculation status, i.e. indicating if score calculation is pending for this alert, not applicable or final.

description.Description: Alert description.

endTimeUtc.Description: The impact end time of the alert (the time of the last event contributing to the alert).

intent.Description: Holds the alert intent stage(s) mapping for this alert.

providerAlertId.Description: The identifier of the alert inside the product which generated the alert.

processingEndTime.Description: The time the alert was made available for consumption.

productComponentName.Description: The name of a component inside the product which generated the alert.

productName.Description: The name of the product which published this alert.

productVersion.Description: The version of the product generating the alert.

remediationSteps.Description: Manual action items to take to remediate the alert.

startTimeUtc.Description: The impact start time of the alert (the time of the first event contributing to the alert).

status.Description: The lifecycle status of the alert.

systemAlertId.Description: Holds the product identifier of the alert for the product.

timeGenerated.Description: The time the alert was generated.

vendorName.Description: The name of the vendor that raise the alert.

alertLink.Description: The uri link of the alert.

resourceIdentifiers.Description: The list of resource identifiers of the alert.

aadTenantId.Description: The Azure Active Directory tenant id.

aadUserId.Description: The Azure Active Directory user id.

accountName.Description: The name of the account. This field should hold only the name without any domain added to it, i.e. administrator.

displayName.Description: The display name of the account.

hostEntityId.Description: The Host entity id that contains the account in case it is a local account (not domain joined)

isDomainJoined.Description: Determines whether this is a domain account.

ntDomain.Description: The NetBIOS domain name as it appears in the alert format domain\username. Examples: NT AUTHORITY.

objectGuid.Description: The objectGUID attribute is a single-value attribute that is the unique identifier for the object, assigned by active directory.

puid.Description: The Azure Active Directory Passport User ID.

sid.Description: The account security identifier, e.g. S-1-5-18.

upnSuffix.Description: The user principal name suffix for the account, in some cases it is also the domain name. Examples: contoso.com.

dnsDomain.Description: The fully qualified domain DNS name.

appName.Description: The name of the related cloud application.

instanceName.Description: The user defined instance name of the cloud application. It is often used to distinguish between several applications of the same type that a customer has.

osVersion.Description: A free text representation of the operating system. This field is meant to hold specific versions the are more fine grained than OSFamily or future values not supported by OSFamily enumeration

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

deviceId.Description: The ID of the IoT Device in the IoT Hub

deviceName.Description: The friendly name of the device

iotSecurityAgentId.Description: The ID of the security agent running on the device

edgeId.Description: The ID of the edge device

macAddress.Description: The MAC address of the device

serialNumber.Description: The serial number of the device

firmwareVersion.Description: The firmware version of the device

operatingSystem.Description: The operating system of the device

iotHubEntityId.Description: The AzureResource entity id of the IoT Hub

hostEntityId.Description: The Host entity id of this device

ipAddressEntityId.Description: The IP entity if of this device

threatIntelligence.Description: A list of TI contexts attached to the IoTDevice entity.

protocols.Description: A list of protocols of the IoTDevice entity.

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

providerName.Description: Name of the provider from whom this Threat Intelligence information was received

address.Description: The IP address as string, e.g. 127.0.0.1 (either in Ipv4 or Ipv6)

location.Description: The geo-location context attached to the ip entity

threatIntelligence.Description: A list of TI contexts attached to the ip entity.

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

countryCode.Description: The country code according to ISO 3166 format

countryName.Description: Country name according to ISO 3166 Alpha 2: the lowercase of the English Short Name

latitude.Description: The longitude of the identified location, expressed as a floating point number with range of -180 to 180, with positive numbers representing East and negative numbers representing West. Latitude and longitude are derived from the city or postal code.

longitude.Description: The latitude of the identified location, expressed as a floating point number with range of - 90 to 90, with positive numbers representing North and negative numbers representing South. Latitude and longitude are derived from the city or postal code.

networkMessageIds.Description: The mail message IDs that are part of the mail cluster

countByDeliveryStatus.Description: Count of mail messages by DeliveryStatus string representation

countByThreatType.Description: Count of mail messages by ThreatType string representation

countByProtectionStatus.Description: Count of mail messages by ProtectionStatus string representation

threats.Description: The threats of mail messages that are part of the mail cluster

query.Description: The query that was used to identify the messages of the mail cluster

mailCount.Description: The number of mail messages that are part of the mail cluster

isVolumeAnomaly.Description: Is this a volume anomaly mail cluster

source.Description: The source of the mail cluster (default is 'O365 ATP')

clusterSourceIdentifier.Description: The id of the cluster source

clusterSourceType.Description: The type of the cluster source

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

fileEntityIds.Description: The File entity ids of this mail message's attachments

recipient.Description: The recipient of this mail message. Note that in case of multiple recipients the mail message is forked and each copy has one recipient

urls.Description: The Urls contained in this mail message

threats.Description: The threats of this mail message

receiveDate.Description: The receive date of this message

networkMessageId.Description: The network message id of this mail message

internetMessageId.Description: The internet message id of this mail message

subject.Description: The subject of this mail message

language.Description: The language of this mail message

antispamDirection.Description: The directionality of this mail message

deliveryAction.Description: The delivery action of this mail message like Delivered, Blocked, Replaced etc

deliveryLocation.Description: The delivery location of this mail message like Inbox, JunkFolder etc

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

externalDirectoryObjectId.Description: The AzureAD identifier of mailbox. Similar to AadUserId in account entity but this property is specific to mailbox object on office side

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

category.Description: The malware category by the vendor, e.g. Trojan

fileEntityIds.Description: List of linked file entity identifiers on which the malware was found

malwareName.Description: The malware name by the vendor, e.g. Win32/Toga!rfn

processEntityIds.Description: List of linked process entity identifiers on which the malware was found.

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

accountEntityId.Description: The account entity id running the processes.

commandLine.Description: The command line used to create the process

creationTimeUtc.Description: The time when the process started to run

elevationToken.Description: The elevation token associated with the process.

hostEntityId.Description: The host entity id on which the process was running

hostLogonSessionEntityId.Description: The session entity id in which the process was running

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

hive.Description: the hive that holds the registry key.

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

valueData.Description: String formatted representation of the value data.

valueType.Description: Specifies the data types to use when storing values in the registry, or identifies the data type of a value in the registry.

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

objectGuid.Description: A single-value attribute that is the unique identifier for the object, assigned by active directory.

sid.Description: The SID attribute is a single-value attribute that specifies the security identifier (SID) of the group

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

networkMessageId.Description: The network message id of email to which submission belongs

timestamp.Description: The Time stamp when the message is received (Mail)

reportType.Description: The submission type for the given instance. This maps to Junk, Phish, Malware or NotJunk.

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

url.Description: A full URL the entity points to

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.

count.Description: Total number of aggregations of the given kind in the incident related entities result.

entityKind.Description: The kind of the aggregated entity.
